rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make PREFIX="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr" install
ln -sf bzdiff "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/bin/bzcmp" ln -sf bzgrep "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/bin/bzegrep" ln -sf bzgrep "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/bin/bzfgrep" ln -sf bzmore "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/bin/bzless"
rm "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/bin/bzcat" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/bin/bzip2"
ln -sf bunzip2 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/bin/bzcat" ln -sf bunzip2 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/bin/bzip2"
